attributes.action: Stop using British Taxpayers money to support bullfighting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want our government to speak out strongly and clearly AGAINST this barbaric practice at all European conferences and to vote against it. We do not want British money used to subsidise the practice in Spain and elsewhere. It is cruel and neglects the rights of the animal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
